attributes.review: I came to this app to support my president but the app started to charge my card every few weeks this app and took over 26 dollars from a account
attributes.title: Don’t not download

attributes.review: Saw someone’s review saying only people old enough to vote should be able to leave a review. I’m old enough, obviously planning to vote this coming fall. Clearly not voting for a stupid orange cheeto puff this fall 💅🏽
attributes.title: Black Lives Matter

attributes.review: This app is the worst thing I’ve ever put on my phone. A monkey with a keyboard could’ve done better. My grandma with dementia could have done better. I also heard this app sells your info
attributes.title: The worst

attributes.review: This app is so glitchy! Seems like it needs a much needed update. I tried to load the app and my phone got so hot it burned my hands and now I’ll be able to play the accordion ever again.
attributes.title: SO GLITCHY

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. I downloaded it to see what the hype about this 🍊 is and was greatly disappointed. 0/10 Would not recommend!! 😡👎🏾😾🙄
attributes.title: Disappointed ❌

attributes.review: It’s keeps kicking me out of the app. When I press anything it just goes black and kicks me out. Worse app ever installed. Such bad vibes this app gives me. Just wanted to know more about my president.
attributes.title: Laggy

attributes.review: I can’t even understand why this would be allowed on the AppStore in the first place. Anyone remember people putting up Obama flags and signs? No. Because it wasn’t a CULT like this is. Take your pruned orange peel sorry excuse for a man somewhere else.
attributes.title: Fascist Orange.

attributes.review: This app is so bad it will quit your phone and make it restart five times it will also to meet your pictures out of your phone and steal your identity
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Do NOT download this every time I would get on the app it kick me right off in the matter of 20 seconds OR LESS and it’s just not okay that an app would kick you off for no reason at all.
attributes.title: THIS APP IS HORRIBLE

attributes.review: I hate this app if I could I would give it a 0 you need to take this down ewwww I can’t even look at his name this is the worst I ever seen before like take it down!!!!!!!!!!!!!🍊🍊
attributes.title: Black lives matter ✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿
